body.name: Proscan PLDED4016A 40-Inch 1080p Full HD LED TV, black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 32 mins
features: Proscan is the leader in entertainment and televisions. This Proscan 40 inch LED HD TV has everything you and your family are looking for in a new television set.Voltage : 120 volts (AC)

The television comes with a built in ATSC tuner. You won't ever have to worry about paying for cable or satellite anymore. With the Proscan television set, you'll be able to receive HD program for free over the airwaves
If you want to connect to an external device,'s fine too! The television set has several options to connect including HDMI, VGA, Audio/Video, PC Audio, Headphone, Coax, and an RF Output
The set is sleek in design as well. Not only does it perform well, but it looks good too! It's ready to mount on the wall and you will be ready to watch in no time
The screen is easy to view at any angle and in the room will be able to watch. You'll love watching your favorite shows, movies and sports events on your new Proscan set
body.description: Product Description When you hear the name Proscan, immediately you think of quality-built, high performance televisions at reasonable prices. The folks at Proscan have once again delivered on these core values with their all new, 40-Inch Full HD, 1080p LED TV with built in ATSC Tuner! Be the boss of your Television with provided full functioning remote control AND use one of the many inputs and outputs to connect your favorite device! This Tv features 1080P full high definition resolution, delivering the highest picture quality. HDMIx3, VGA, Audio/Video, PC Audio, Headphone, Coax and an RF Output! Perfect for your bed-room, den, living room or anywhere you want a great looking large screen TV! They’ve loaded up this ergonomic, wall mount ready television with every feature you need. The built in ATSC Tuner for instance, allows you to watch HD programming over the air without service fees! The brilliant screen is amazing from all angles.the sound quality will certainly impress your friends and family. Now it’s your opportunity to enjoy pure beauty. From the proud makers at Proscan, the leader in LED Televisions! Amazon.com

productInformation.value: #56,538 in Electronics (See Top 100 in Electronics) #258 in LED & LCD TVs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Looking for a non-smart tv for a bedroom no smaller than 40”. A Search found the ProScan on Amazon. I looked at the reviews and ratings and decided to purchase the 40” screen. From personal testimonials it is not a good idea to have a smart tv in a bedroom so this was a great option. The picture is great but the sound doesn't seem to be Dolby. Maybe it's just my hearing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Proscan NON Smart TV
reviews.reviewText: Great price for and great picture for Antenna Air (FREE) TV without the Smart TV that requires internet connection.Still has USB, Computer and other Non-Internet features.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Got rid of our "smart" tv
reviews.reviewText: We'd had it with so called smart tvs. When our smart tv took over the antenna interface by adding 260 channels of free TV that we had no interest in along with a bloated SLOW interface, that was the last straw. We got this "dumb" tv because it had a built in tuner for the antenna and two HDMI ports for our streaming and casting devices. We added speakers as well as the TV sound is tinny on it's own. We couldn't be happier with a tv that doesn't need to connect to the Internet, that is so simple to operate and has a very nice menu interface. We stream all our favorite services (via HDMI devices) and use the antenna for local stations. Very happy with this tv!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ... 40 inch TV this morning and has been running good all day
reviews.reviewText: I just got my Proscan 40 inch TV this morning and has been running good all day, I ordered it non Nov 9th it was shipped the same day so it took 7 days to get here and I consider myself lucky. I read the reviews and was a little apprehensive about ordering it but feel just fine now for those whom need the Direct TV handset code for it is ( 13577 ) it works fine, it has a better picture than the Vizo of the same size and the sound is fine I have a sound bar and with that the sound is good. The menus are self explanatory had it up and running In 10 minutes so we will see how it does, so far I give my experience a five star, thank you Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good prodict for money
reviews.reviewText: As of today i will give it a 4 star rating. Sounds is not great but plan to hook it to a sound system. Volumn control on metrocast remote does not work so it appears will have to deal with to remotes. Picture qualoty ok though my old Dynex seemed better. Will rewrite these review in a couple of months on performance. It's been two years and picture is still good. Sound better with sound system. This TV runs 24/7 and has had no glitches in operation. So will keep the rating posted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars NO AUDIO OUT
reviews.reviewText: This TV has an HDMI-ARC cable but NO audio out. I'm not sure how that's possible but it's true. Save yourself the trouble (especially if you intend to hook up a sound bar or external speakers) and do NOT purchase this television.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for games.
reviews.reviewText: Great video game monitor. I like how it swaps from 60/50 hz, so my pal region games actually show up correctly. pictures quality is really good, since I dont play anything higher than 1080p.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Its really nice but...
reviews.reviewText: There's a small crack at the bottom of the TV its not noticeable from far away and it doesn't mess with the picture but just the thought of it being there bothers me
HAS A GOOD PICTURE AND SOUND does what a TV should do wish it were easy to buy a simple dumb TV . Who needs a smart TV ?
